title: Castle Rock S1E03 Explained
author: Think Story
comment: Something I noticed about the correlation between Henry's father asking him in the past "Do you hear it" and when the kid tells Henry "Do you hear it now?". Heavy emphasis on the "NOW" part because he says this after he asks how old Henry is. Implying he should hear something now that he is older? Or rather after something has happened or someone has died? His father? Dale?
Your companion pieces add a lot to my enjoyment of the show, thanks and keep up the good work.
Outstanding breakdown!  You pointed out a lot I missed.

Love the breakdowns. 

One connection I haven't seen any breakdown make yet:
Bonus points to whoever can tell me how many minions it took Molly to make her jacket ;)
description:
I delve into season one, episode three of Castle Rock "Local Color" and look at the hidden details, mysteries, easter eggs and Stephen King references.
